mainText:
I am an artist and I am a nurse.  Steve Jobs and Apple have had a really profound impact on my life, not just because of the all the amazing products which this former PC geek discovered, bought and which are part of my daily life, but because of his courage despite illness and his talent to lead the also very talented people who are part of Apple.

My deepest sympathies to his family, to his friends, to his team.
author: Trudy
